q1: In this year Mexico was very good
a1: They were good against Germany and South Korea but then lost it.
a2: Well, I know they made it out of the group stage.
q3: Mexico lost to Brazil in round of 16
q4: It had to be Guillermo Ochoa; he's such a wall for Mexico.
a4: I consider guillermo ochoa one of the best goalkeepers currently
q5: How many saves has he made?
a5: He has many a lot of saves, too many to count.
